cab.content: (P. 1498) From Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department, oll)5Utli March 1921, (Received 16th, 2 pan.)362 S. Following telegram has been received from Dobbs, 70 C, dated LSthMarcli:- 4"i questioned Tarsi to-day regarding the Afghan deputation to Berlin, lie replied that their object was to get acquainted with European subjects, and with international discussion now proceeding. He hinted, if permitted, deputation might try to visit Paris and London."
